prompts: Create a fairy-type Pokemon with a flower crown and bright colors.
Imagine a cute, pink Pokemon that loves to play in the sun and bloom.
Show me a Pokemon that transforms with the seasons, featuring vibrant colors.
Generate a small, cheerful creature that brings joy wherever it goes.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a cherry blossom, with petal-like wings.
Give me a whimsical Pokemon that embodies the spirit of springtime.
Make a Pokemon that can be found in flowering meadows, with a joyful demeanor.
